list.name: Small frame spike
list.query: SELECT derivative("mc_total_egress", 1s) FROM "packet_stats" WHERE "interface" =~ /^swp32$/ AND time > 1490929803800ms and time < 1490929805880ms

list.name: Max Highwater Mark
list.query: select max(watermark) from buffer_stat where interface = 'swp32'

targets.query: SELECT distinct("usage_system") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" = 'mlx-2700-06' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.label: interface
list.name: interface
list.query: show tag values from histogram with key = "interface"

list.name: Buffers
list.query: show tag values from histogram with key = "buffer"
